ygData.subject: Re: Smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of what to make at what skill.... My skill is 50 now, I tried making Skewers the other day and just wasted my plat.. out of about 40 attempts not one
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of what to make at what skill....

My skill is 50 now, I tried making Skewers the other day and just wasted my
plat.. out of about 40 attempts not one imp, and maybe 10 skewers. Is there
something less difficult to make at this lv?

Qildar Goodheart

><< Make skewers to get your skill up, these are good until skill 115,
>although
> around skill 110, I was good enough at making banded that I stopped
>advancing
> my skill and just made armor for sale. I believe after skewers you can
> make skewing kits up to skill 175. >>
>
>Yes...you will save money in the long run bringing your skill to 115 with
>skewers... Then...if you want and have a little extra money...and a bit of
>extra time...Sewing Kits will bring your skill to 135...to get to 175,
>you'll
>need to make banded...the problem is, is that only banded Cloaks, Mantles
>and
>Leggings are not trivial at 135.
>
